name: Erin O'Connell
content: Andy was recommended to me by a friend and since learning to drive with him I too have recommended him to mine. As anyone would be, I was quite nervous about learning to drive but andys professionalism and friendly nature put me at ease. Andy was also very flexible with times of lessons and where to be picked up/dropped off which made learning to drive easy despite having a lifestyle that involved me moving around alot. After failing my first test due to a serious case of nerves, Andy helped me build my confidence up again enough for me to pass the second time with very few minors! I've now even booked my pass plus with him and can't thank him enough, I'd recommend Andy to anyone wanting to learn to drive due to his patience, experience, and the odd funny joke!
